text: The Commission shall keep itself informed as to the manner and method in which the business of all public utilities is conducted, and shall have the right to obtain from any public utility all necessary information to enable the Commission to perform its duties.

chapter.text: Rates, Examinations, Investigations, and Hearings. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Commission to keep informed of business conduct of utilities.
